response.original_title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
response.overview: An Israeli counterterrorism soldier with a secretly fabulous ambition to become a Manhattan hairstylist. Zohan's desire runs so deep that he'll do anything -- including faking his own death and going head-to-head with an Arab cab driver -- to make his dreams come true.
response.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan

titles.title: Zohan - O Agente Bom de Corte

cast.name: Deborah Rombaut
cast.character: Snooty French Girl at the Club
